headline: Broadcom and Badger Meter have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
summary: Broadcom earns Bull of the Day on AI data center demand and recurring software revenue, while Badger Meter faces rising costs and pressure.

headline: U.S. Frackers Explore New Frontier: Shale Abroad
summary: The prolific Permian Basin distracted American producers from international shale. Now, they are returning.

headline: Momentum Investors Find Energy
summary: Two of the best-managed oil companies show that the momentum trade has just begun to enter the oil patch.
